#summary Replay header format
#labels Platform-PC,Game-Starcraft,Type-FileFormat

=Format=

u8		// Is Broodwar
u32		// Number of Frames
u8		// 	Unknown
u8		// 	Unknown
u8		// 	Unknown
u32		// Creation Date
u8[12]		// Available Slots
char[28]	// Game Name
u16		// Map Width
u16		// Map Height
u8		// 	Unknown (0x01)
u8		// Slots Available
u16		// Game Speed
u16		// Game Type
u16		// Game Subtype
u32		// 	Unknown (Random Seed?)
u16		// Tileset
u16		// 	Unknown ( x > 0 ) (0x01)
char[25]	// Creator Name
char[32]	// Map Name
u16		// GameTemplate	Game Type ID
u16		// GameTemplate	Subtype ID
u16		// GameTemplate	Subtype Display Value
u16		// GameTemplate	Subtype Label
u8		// GameTemplate	Victory Conditions (Map Default, Melee, Highest Score, Resources, CTF, Sudden Death, Slaughter, 1v1)
u8		// GameTemplate	Resources (type) (Map Default, Fixed Value, Low, Medium, High, Income)
u8		// GameTemplate	Unit Stats (Map Default, Standard)
u8		// GameTemplate	Fog of War (Off, Warcraft1, On)
u8		// GameTemplate	Starting Units (Map Default, Workers Only, Workers+Center)
u8		// GameTemplate	Starting Positions (Random, Fixed)
u8		// GameTemplate	Player Types (Bit 0 = Computer Available; Bit 1 = Single Player)
u8		// GameTemplate	Allies (Not Allowed, Allowed)
u8		// GameTemplate	Number of Teams
u8		// GameTemplate	Cheat Codes (Off, On)
u8		// GameTemplate	Tournament Mode (Off, On)
u32		// GameTemplate	Victory Condition Value
u32		// GameTemplate	Resources Value
u32		// GameTemplate		Unknown/unused
u8		// 	Unknown/unused

struct[12] //Player Structures (*12)
{
	u32		// Player ID
	u32		// Number of Actions
	u8		// Owner
	u8		// Race
	u8		// Force
	Char[25]	// Player Name
}

u32[8]		// Player Colour
u8[8]		// 	Unknown (0x01 if custom colour is used)
